name: lucatume/wp-browser
description: WordPress extension of the PhpBrowser class.

suggest.codeception/module-phpbrowser:^1.0: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPBrowser module.
suggest.codeception/module-webdriver:^1.0: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPWebDriver module.
suggest.codeception/module-db:^1.0: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPDb module, PHP 5.6 compatible version.
suggest.codeception/module-filesystem:^1.0: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPFilesystem module.
suggest.codeception/module-cli:^1.0: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPCLI module.
suggest.codeception/util-universalframework:^1.0: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WordPress framework module.
suggest.gumlet/php-image-resize: To handle runtime image modification in the WPDb::haveAttachmentInDatabase method.
suggest.vlucas/phpdotenv:^4.0: To manage more complex environment file based configuration of the suites.
